arts.ttl: Mexico winger reveals failed Liverpool transfer
arts.sum: Pumas striker Cesar 'Chino' Huerta has not given up hope of playing in the Premier League one day after his move to Liverpool fell through this summer.

arts.ttl: When is Mexico - Canada? Times, how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The game between Mexico and Canada will be played on Tuesday, September 10 with kick off at 8:30 p.m. ET / 5:30 p.m. PT. In their first September friendlies, Mexico recorded a 3-0 home win over New Zealand, with Canada claiming a historic victory away to neighbours the United States.
